title: She’s Thunderstorms
lyrics:
This song came about when Alex Turner was looking for a new way to complement someone, at the time he was in New York and there was a… you guessed it, thunderstorm.
[Chorus]
She's thunderstorms, lying on her front
Up against the wall, she's thunderstorms
[Verse 1]
I've been feeling foolish, you should try it
She came and substituted the peace and quiet for
[Pre-Chorus]
Acrobatic blood flow, 
concertina
Cheating heart beat, 
rapid fire
[Chorus]
She's thunderstorms, lying on her front
Up against the wall, she's thunderstorms
Here is your host, 
sounds as if she's pretty close
When the heat starts growing horns, 
she's thunderstorms
[Verse 2]
She's been loop-the-looping around my mind
Her motorcycle boots give me this kind of
[Pre-Chorus]
Acrobatic blood, 
concertina
Cheating heart beat, 
rapid fire

[Chorus]
She's thunderstorms, lying on her front
Up against the wall, she's thunderstorms
[Bridge]
In an unusual place, when you're feeling far away
She does what the night does to the day
[Chorus]
She's thunderstorms, lying on her front
Up against the wall, she's thunderstorms
Thunderstorms, thunderstorms
